identity.name: E1 - The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a travel platform that feels like a premium editorial magazine mixed with a high-tech flight deck. Fusion of 'National Geographic' aesthetics and 'Fintech' precision.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix botanical aesthetics with aerospace precision.
Emotion First: Every pixel must evoke 'Wanderlust' or 'Security'.
Content is King: Destinations are the heroes; UI is the frame.
Zoom In: Use macro details for textures (sand, passport stamps).
Negative Space: Luxury is defined by what isn't there.

headings.usage: Hero titles, destination names, editorial sections

technical.usage: Flight numbers, prices, dates, dashboard metrics

primary.name: Ocean Depth
primary.usage: Primary buttons, active states, key icons

rules: Never use pure black (#000000). Use Slate-950 (#020617).
Dark mode backgrounds must be deep blue-grey, not flat grey.
Primary color usage should be limited to <10% of the screen.

marketing.rules: Use col-span-8 for hero images, col-span-4 for supporting text. Never fill 100% evenly.

dashboard.rules: Compact cards. Use row-span-2 for tall lists.

solid.classes: bg-card border border-border shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-transform hover:scale-105 active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/90 rounded-full px-6 py-2 font-medium
buttons.outline: border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary/10 rounded-full px-6 py-2 font-medium

inputs.style: bg-background border-border focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 rounded-md h-12 px-4

textures.grain: Use SVG filters for subtle grain on solid backgrounds

transitions.page: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.4 }}

hero.description: Aerial view of tropical island - Main Hero
Fiji top down view - Secondary Hero

flights.description: Modern airplane cabin - Flight Booking Header

hotels.description: Luxury room with ocean view - Hotel Detail

vehicles.description: White SUV on road - Car Rental

3d_libraries.usage: Interactive globe on landing page hero section to visualize destinations.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive and key informational elements MUST include a data-testid attribute.
instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Modern Explorer' theme. Start with the Landing Page using the Tetris Grid and the 3D Globe. Then build the Dashboard using the High Density Grid. Use the provided image URLs for their respective sections. Ensure the Dark/Light mode toggle works seamlessly with the defined color palette.
